title: Lotte Kopecky Slaps Back at Media Critics: ‘Done with Opinions, High Expectations’
content:
World champion reveals knee injury: ‘Sometimes it is hard to hear everything people are saying without having any clue what’s happening in our lives.’

Read the full article at Lotte Kopecky Slaps Back at Media Critics: ‘Done with Opinions, High Expectations’ on Velo.
author: ahood
